name: Escape Room:Survival of Desert Island
description:
Your plane was forced to land on a desert island due to a mechanical failure, you found a small wooden house in the center of the island, maybe you can find the communication equipment in the room to ask for help. Are you ready to accept the challenge of survival? Hurry up to try the latest escape game!

Game Features:
1. a challenging level
2. rich music effects
3. beautiful picture
